H0.text: Ereuthophobia is the irrational fear of which colour. Purple

H1.text: Ereuthophobia is the irrational fear of which colour. Turquoise

H2.text: Ereuthophobia is the irrational fear of which colour. Silver

H3.text: Ereuthophobia is the irrational fear of which colour. Red

A4.text: A blush is a reddening of the cheeks and forehead brought about by increased capillary blood flow in the skin.

A5.text: Blushing or erubescence is the reddening of a person's face due to psychological reasons.
